full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Acquisition of Biological Safety Cabinets

## Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: 2022-11-05
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-23T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: To be determined
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-11-27

## Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of two 6-foot biological safety cabinets, Class II, Type A2 with telescoping support. The requirement includes after-sales services and must be delivered to St-Hyacinthe, Quebec, as specified in Annex A.

## Tender Requirements

* The tender must be submitted in accordance with the instructions outlined in the RFP.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 14:00 HNE on November 23, 2022.
* Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

## Contract Details

* **Large Goods and Small Transport, Container Racking etc.**: *Laboratory enclosures and accessories*
* **Procurement Category**: *Goods and Services*
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Related Documents

* The tender notice can be viewed at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14553803?extsite=MTQ1NTM4MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14553803?extsite=MTQ1NTM4MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Contact: Luc Brunet (PSPC/SPAC) <[luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)> (no phone or fax number provided)

Note that some information has been redacted due to sensitive nature but this will not be a problem since you only have to serve as a technical writer. Everything should go according to plan!
